keyTakeAways: Yaoning 'Mike' Sun, a Chinese citizen living in the U.S., pleaded guilty to acting as an illegal agent for the People’s Republic of China between 2022 and 2024.
Sun operated a website where he received instructions from Chinese officials to post pro-Beijing content, which may have influenced local political outcomes.
Sun served as a campaign advisor and treasurer for Arcadia City Council candidate Eileen Wang, who won election in 2022.
Sun drafted a report in 2023 seeking funding and assignments for pro-Beijing political activities, indicating strategic planning for foreign influence.
Sun’s case is part of a broader pattern of foreign interference concerns during President Joe Biden’s administration, particularly targeting Asian-American communities and local elections.
Sun is expected to appear in court in Los Angeles on Monday, with a potential sentence of up to 10 years in prison if the plea is accepted.
The case is tied to Chen Jun, who was previously sentenced in New York for acting as a foreign agent for China, suggesting a network of operatives operating across U.S. jurisdictions.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A Chinese citizen living in the U.S., Yaoning 'Mike' Sun, has agreed to plead guilty to acting as an illegal agent for the People’s Republic of China from 2022 to 2024. Sun, who worked as a campaign advisor and treasurer for Arcadia City Council candidate Eileen Wang, received instructions from Chinese officials to post pro-Beijing content on a website he managed. These actions, which included drafting a report to request funding for pro-Beijing political activities, violate U.S. law requiring foreign agents to disclose their activities. The case reflects broader U.S. concerns about foreign interference in local elections, particularly in communities with significant Asian populations. Sun is expected to appear in court in Los Angeles and could face up to 10 years in prison. This case is linked to another individual, Chen Jun, previously convicted for similar activities, suggesting a coordinated network of foreign operatives targeting U.S. politics.
title: California Man Pleads Guilty to Acting as Illegal Agent for Chinese Government
